{{cpp/title|getwchar}}
{{cpp/io/c/navbar}}
{{ddcl|header=cwchar|
std::wint_t getwchar();
}}
Reads the next wide character from {{lc|stdin}}.

===Parameters===
(none)

===Return value===
The obtained wide character, or {{lc|WEOF}} if an error has occurred or the end of file reached
